cab.content: OPE R A T I 0 N S .Prom:- General Radcliffe, Italy. To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.Despatched 11.30 p.m, 19.12.17* Received 11*55 a.m, .20.12,17*10057 December 19th evening.4th Army. Artillery action only during day, 80 prisoners, majority from the 4th Austrian Division and some from the 200th German Division were captured by Italians yesterdayo Prisoners state in consequence of its heavy losses the Austrian 4th Division is being relieved by the 55th 01st Army. Some activity of artillery and patrols, 3rd Army. Italians made-three attempts to repel the enemy at Ga Lunga on the Sile. The enemy was driven back to the river bank and 20 or 30 prisoners were taken, but at that point he still maintains a footing.. The Vireather is warmer and the snow on the mountains is melting fast.
